description: There are lots of ways to grow your startup. Growth hacking, social media, SEO, content marketing, digital marketing & more. We'll talk about the core foundation of growth and what makes up a growth hacker. You'll learn how to determine if you're ready for growth and the basics of growth from the 4 principles to evaluating the 19 traction channels to using google keyword planner for evaluating your competition. We'll dive into some growth case studies to give you more ideas and examples to use for your company. Finally, we'll summarize what we've learned and I'll give you 15 growth resources to take your knowledge to the next level.
title: The Growth Hacking Survival Guide for 2016
